website_summaries.verdict: Though they get rave reviews for their looks, their appearance far outpaces their comfort level. Unless you aren't fazed by uncomfortable shoes, they may not work for you.
pros: They look good with everything from sundresses to formal wear
cons: There is no padding in the insole, and the toe strap has a snug fit
Some owners complain of discomfort after wearing them for short periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these heels! My size fits a little snug. Maybe I should've gone a half size bigger. Other than that than that, they're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved these shoes very fast which was a plus. Although they are beautiful, they aren't comfortable and it appears that I cant fit them completely. I ordered a size 10 which is my true size but unfortunately they are just small for my feet. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Must have in every woman's closet👠
customer_reviews.text: They are very snug. You will never to order up a size, at least half a size. Other then that, they really are the perfect shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Narrow and Tight
customer_reviews.text: my ankles are 7.5 inches circumference and where the front strap is over the toes, I'm an 8....my feet are slender to say the least and I wear an 8.5. These were unbelievably tight. I can't imagine anyone with wider feet being comfortable without going up at least .5 to 1 size. Even then, I don't think I'll reorder. They just seemed like even if I went up a size, they'd still be uncomfortable or SOMETHING would be off. They are very cute though. If you don't have far to walk or long to wear, at a good sale price, they may be worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Ava M.

customer_reviews.title: Way too small and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have small and narrow feet and these were ridiculously small. I ordered my usual size (6) and my feet were hanging OVER the side! I can’t imagine how skinny your foot must be to fit in these shoes. They are so cute so it’s beyond dissapointing they didn’t work for what I wanted. I’m not even sure sizing up a half size would’ve worked either. The strap over the toes was tight as well. Extremely unsatisifed with these and ended up with a cheaper and way more comfortable pair from Target.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal R

customer_reviews.title: Toe Strap Too Small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so beautiful and sleek - I was very excited to invest in a pair that I know I will get a lot of mileage in. Unfortunately when these arrived the toe straps were too small, I had to pull my toes up in the front and couldn't tolerate the pain of having to break them in. I am a size 6 with fairly narrow feet and I have never experienced a problem with a shoe being too small in regards to width. I was very sad because they are definitely beautiful... but I would opt for another pair if you don't want to pain of having to stretch them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: While these shoes are absolutely beautiful. They are NOT COMFORTABLE!!!!! The shoes are HARD. No cushion what so ever. I wore these for a wedding that I was a bridesmaid in. I must have died a thousand times. My feet were sore for 2 days afterward. It's a miracle that I didn't have any blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Mombrun

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but arrived damaged and sticky?
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe. I advise ordering a half size up. I'm disappointed because they arrived damaged. Though listed as new, they appear to have been worn. There are black stuff marks on both shoes. There's also a sticky substance on both shoes. They arrived in a torn Steve Madden box filled with tissue paper. I will be returning them for another pair. I will try to order again but with a different vendor.
customer_reviews.author: jenn3780

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes, but Size up!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't listen to previous reviews and ordered my normal 6.5 size. They were too small. The ankle strap was super tiny... and I don't even have big ankles. I returned them and got a size 7. The ankle strap is maybe a tad tight but I feel like it's loosened up a little from wear. Overall these are beautiful shoes, comfortable to wear and the heel isn't too high. Make sure to order half or even a full size larger! Don't ignore the reveiws;)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Heels
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it a four star because there was a small scratch inside of the heel, good thing my feet cover it, but you do get what you pay for. I paid $50 for my heels compared to $80 in Macy's & other retail stores, so I'm very satisfied with what I received. The shoe is in perfect condition besides that small scratch. I wear size 5 in heels & these definitely fit, although they are a little tight on the toes. I tried on the 5 1/2 in the Steve Madden store but it was too loose. These heels are supet cute & match with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Very Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I needed these specific shoes for a bridesmaid outfit and was pretty frustrated when I got them. I ordered the Stecy, natural and the picture showed matte material in every picture, in fact there wasn't even a choice for the glossy. When I opened them they were the exact shoe but glossy not matte. In fact I can't even find where you would buy the show glossy. I'm super frustrated since I feel like the product was misrepresented in the pictures and the product information because what I got was not what was shown or explained. Now I have to return them and run around trying to find the correct one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a fan of the styling.
customer_reviews.text: I took 3 stars off because of the styling. The toe strap is at a diagonal, too close to the toes and very uncomfortable. I don't like how the small triangle of heel coverage looked. It buckled against the back of my heel which made the side view bad. I liked the height, not too tall. I liked the color, it's not a light nude. I'm Chinese and tan easily and wear flip flops a lot. The shape of the sole has a curve wasn't a good fit for me. I'm usually a 7, a 7.5 would have been a better size. I didn't exchange them for a 7.5 because of the styling.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: NOPE.
customer_reviews.text: I love Steve Madden shoes and I own many but this was the most painful shoe I have ever owned. I threw them out after wearing them for an hour in Las Vegas. Because they are patent leather they do not give AT ALL, that strap is snug after walking around in them for a few minutes they dig into your skin and feel like knives cutting you. They're nice to look at that's all. SO PAINFUL, don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: C. DiMeglio

customer_reviews.title: Classy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes ! Pretty mat cobalt blue as pictured. Timeless shoe. Simple but elegant. I already own the nude color that I brought from my local Dillard's. The heel is high however if you're used to walking in heels it's not a problem and they're really comfortable. I wear them to work often and last night I wore the blue ones to a party and was dancing all night and my feet did not even hurt hours later! Have to get black next to add to the collection!
customer_reviews.author: Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Cute but found better
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes but like the Sam Edleman Arielle better. The ankle straps on these are really thin which makes them look cheap & it was hare to push the end of the strap thru the buckle on both shoes which is annoying. The part that covers your heel is also smaller than on the Arielle. The Arielle is just a higher quality, classier shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Higher Baby

customer_reviews.title: not made right
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this shoe, but it was not made right. The part of the shoe that goes behind your heel is not tall enough, so the ankle strap doesn't sit around the skinny part of your ankle, it sits around the bulkiest part of your ankle joint... and isn't long enough to close. I think if the heel part was made so that the strap sat higher up on your leg (to sit just above the ankle bone instead of over it) it would be a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and tiny.
customer_reviews.text: I have never needed wide shoes, I don’t have fat or stubby toes and I couldn’t squeeze my toes into these. The top strap was barely long enough to fasten and felt so cheap that I was sure it would break if I actually walked in these. I was so disappointed because I wanted these to wear on my birthday. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: deLUXmomma

customer_reviews.title: Coral does not = fluorescent pink.
customer_reviews.text: The color of these is way off, at least on the ones I ordered/received. I ordered coral, to wear with a black and white dress to a cocktail dinner. They're practically fluorescent pink, and aren't appropriate for the work function to which I was planning to wear them. So they're being returned. They're cute shoes otherwise and they seem like they'd be comfortable with some foot pads. The other colors might be more accurate, I just know the coral was not coral.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Too loose
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, but I followed the other reviewers and bought the half size up (I'm usually an 8.5 and bought the 9). Unfortunately, they were too loose everywhere and I couldn't walk in them. By the time I received them, the great price I had bought them at was already gone, so I did not order the next size down.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa G

customer_reviews.title: A BIT on the Painful side.... :/
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Steve Madden heels. I have several pairs and am a lifetime Madden customer. I love the look of these heels, however the ball of the foot was pretty painful with this heel. Pretty shoe none the less! (for a short period of time). Not sure if these are worth the pain for me.
customer_reviews.author: TipsFromTori

customer_reviews.title: One new one used?
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come in a shoe box or even a box that somewhat resembled a shoe box. One of the shoes is clearly worn, the strap was not attached to the shoe. The strap has a small crack in it. There are black marks on the bottom of the shoe and in the toe bed. The other looks perfectly new with plastic and foam still on it. It makes no sense!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Shoe, Not very practical
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is extremely stylish and lovely. Unfortunately, I needed them for a long night out in the city and didn't feel as though the heel was sturdy enough to ensure a comfortable (or somewhat bearable) walk through the city. There is not a whole lot of support around the ankle so this leads to a fear of unsteadiness. Additionally, the toe strap is pretty narrow, and I could see where there might be the issue of blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen06

customer_reviews.title: Order your normal size!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Followed the advise of other buyers and ordered the half size up. SHOULD HAVE ORDERED MY REGULAR SIZE!!! I hesitated on the size I ordered and should have gone with my gut. The heel is way too loose and it’s a broken ankle waiting to happen! Toe strap was fine, not too tight or too loose
customer_reviews.author: Ms Graves

customer_reviews.title: These heels are gorg but I recommend for woman who have narrow feet my feet are ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 5 exactly and these were a bit small. These heels are gorg but I recommend for woman who have narrow feet my feet are wide nor narrow but I had a hard time getting my toes in the front strap and my toes looked so squished they were turning blue as if my blood wasn't circulating lol. I normally don't have this problem it's normally opposite. Oh the ankle strap moves as you walk that bothered the heck out of me.
customer_reviews.author: derrick

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but too narrow for my foot
customer_reviews.text: Giving 4 stars because it's a super stylish shoe and I was looking forward to wearing them to my cousin's wedding this month. However, they are a very narrow shoe and didn't even come close to fitting width-wise at the ball of my foot, and the length fit perfectly, so sizing up would have made the shoe too big and I had to return them. However, my cousin did order the shoe in a half size up and it worked great for her.
customer_reviews.author: Erica L. Borgia

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: So these shoes are a must have in everyone’s closet. It’s simple, classic, elegant, and goes with almost everything!
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: My go to heel sandal. These heels are super comfy and a great quality. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: YoSan

customer_reviews.title: Generally not comfortable. I would not expect this in a $20 ...
customer_reviews.text: Really poorly made. Arrived with spots where the leather had already peeled off. Also, the ankle strap is not measured properly. Without even putting it on, I know it would be too small. I have objectively thin ankles and even the loosest hole on the strap was cutting off the circulation in my ankle. I am shocked at the quality of this. Generally not comfortable. I would not expect this in a $20 shoe, much less an $80 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the tits. They are tight in the toe strap, but will stretch out with use. They are well made, and sleek looking. Perfect for a LBD in the summer. I have narrow feet, so the width works well, but if you have wide feet these are likely not a good match.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed! 😍
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! I could not find this shoe locally, so I decided to take a chance and order online because they were needed for an event that I recently attended. After reading some of the reviews I decided to order this shoe (2 sizes bigger) and they were a perfect fit. FYI: If you are looking to purchase this shoe I would suggest ordering (1-2) sizes bigger. Great comfortable shoe for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Pechoka Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes I tried on in the Steve Madden store in a size 7. They were way to big in the back of the heel so I bought the 6.5 because they were out of stock at the store. Unfortunately, this ran way smaller than a size 7 so I had to return them. I really wanted these shoes. I have medium width feet. Not too big but not too small. Barely fit my toes through the opening.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Classic nude heel. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these heels. They are the epitome of a classic, nude heel. Simple and elegant. Goes with everything. Plus, they are incredibly easy to walk in and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So I knew this would be a great heel for me
customer_reviews.text: Shoes come really quick! Which is always a +. I have a very narrow foot, So I knew this would be a great heel for me. With that being said I have to still get use to the strap. For me having very narrow feet and skinny ankles. I can comfortably were the strap loose around my ankle and still be able to walk. However I did have to order a WHOLE SIZE DOWN I wear a 10 and I wear a 9 comfortably in the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Walker

customer_reviews.title: The ankle straps are very short. I don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: The ankle straps are very short. I don't have very large ankles and the straps barely wrapped around my ankles and are so tight on the ankle bone that they are extremely uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney R.

customer_reviews.title: These are a nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice looking shoe, but the toe strap was tight (I have an average width foot) to the point that I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: MJM412

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are stunning but painful, which I expected
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are stunning but painful, which I expected. I would call them my brief walking a and mostly sitting shoes. I bought a half size up based on other reviews and am glad I did, the 7.5 I normally wear might have been a bit too small and I have wider feet anyway. Best to be safe. They are beautiful though and exactly what I was looking for with out paying the price of the Stuart Weitzman version.
customer_reviews.author: Swbwalt

customer_reviews.title: Foot loose
customer_reviews.text: At first when I put them on they were a little I was questioning myself should got the next size cause I purchased 2 of the same shoe but different colors but after walking in them for and hour they fit just right. Maybe because I just had got out of the feel my feet where swollen a tab bit. But a beautiful simple classy strap heel you can't go right dress up or down..
customer_reviews.author: Divine Queens

customer_reviews.title: The look great with everything and I wear them quite often during ...
customer_reviews.text: The look great with everything and I wear them quite often during the spring and summer. They're quite comfortable for the first few hours, but once your feet start hurting it goes downhill quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Second pair
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes 2 years ago and was wearing them constantly. Heels got a little damaged so I decided to purchase it again. So elegant. One of my favorite shoes honestly. Just goes with everything. Love it
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely narrow.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute shoes but unless you have very VERY very thin and narrow feet these won’t work. It was laughable when I put them on, they look like shoes for kids that’s how narrow they are. Remember sizing up won’t fix this problem. You can see in my pic how much your feet hang out. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: tinaweena

customer_reviews.title: Does not bend when walking.
customer_reviews.text: I am in the process of returning these. I love the look but these are terrible shoes. I am use to high heels and these are uncomfortable and do not allow for a normal gait due to the fact that they do not bend at all. It also does not have any of the compensating curve to the sole like a wedge does making it easier to walk. I was very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, small fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are super cute. HOWEVER, as per the other reviews they do run a bit small. I have slim ankles and long toes. So the ankle straps just fit. If u have large ankles the strap won't fit. My toes came just to the edge which is a bit small. I needed them for an all white party and did Amazon Prime and got them in 2 days. For the price and purpose, worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight Ankle Strap
customer_reviews.text: These are great, except the ankle strap is kind of small, and gets very tight if you move your foot the wrong way. I do not have large ankles either (5'3, 125lbs), so I was surprised by this. They are beautiful shoes, but I could only wear these out for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: jh

customer_reviews.title: Three stars because they’re pretty but very uncomfortable due to the narrow sole and ...
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because they’re pretty but very uncomfortable due to the narrow sole and very painful at the ankle backstrap... Wore them once & had blisters on the back of my ankles!! Do not order them if your foot is medium width because it will be too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Color
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this shoe a 3 because it is not a true rose gold color but rather closer to a light pink/metallic blush color. Also, there was a few scratches on the back of the left heel that while minor still left me a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful shoes however I would recommend going a half size ...
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful shoes however I would recommend going a half size up. I have narrow feet and dainty ankles and found that although I can do up the ankle strap I will get another hole made in them for comfort and it is fairly narrow at the ball of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Drazek

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfy
customer_reviews.text: The buckle rests very awkwardly and slightly in the middle of your ankle like you can see in others photos. I wish it rested on the side. The heels themselves are very cute but very uncomfortable. I did half a size up and they were still a little snug, I normally wear an 8 1/2. I had 5 blisters on my feet after wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Heels looked great and I was able to wear it for most ...
customer_reviews.text: Heels looked great and I was able to wear it for most of the evening. Like most heels I wear, they did start to hurt after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: RCSINY

customer_reviews.title: Knock off all the way.  Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I’m going with had to have been a knock off? Shoe didn’t fit like a shoe should. Super narrow and just weird.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hyser

customer_reviews.title: I really like everything about this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really like everything about this shoe. However, I wore them out all night and towards the end of the night I took them off and I lost the ankle strap. I called customer service on the Steve Madden website and they don't sell the strap. I feel like they should make the strap part of the shoe/permanently attached to the shoe so you don't lose it. I just bought these shoes and now I can't wear them because I am missing the strap! Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit & ankle straps fit just fine!
customer_reviews.text: These were true to size. Im a curvy size 8 with "thicker" legs and ankles & the straps fit fine. Not too sure how big these other people's ankles are where these were too snug or even too small?! Maybe they're manufactured with inconsistent lengths? Anyhow, in my opinion, don't worry about these straps not fitting, unless you have MUCH larger than average sized ankles! I can't forget to mention the most important part... these are totally hot!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Painful.
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear these shoes for a wedding and I am dreading it. I can barely get the strap around the ankle and am looking into having another hole punched into the strap. Here's hoping I can make it a few hours in these shoes before the reception when I can put other shoes on!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, and very orange
customer_reviews.text: I liked these but ended up returning them, simply because I didn't like the dress I bought to go with them! I will say the orange-pink color you see is true oraange. I thought it looked pinky in the picture. I wear a 9.5 or 10 in shoes, and I always wear a 9.5 in Steve Madden. I love the style!
customer_reviews.author: CRamon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the price but boy oh boy are they uncomfortable. Got them for a wedding and was getting ready in them and started to feel the pain before I even left the house!
customer_reviews.author: MamadoesitbestTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great show for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable and a perfect cheaper substitute to the Stuart Weitzman ones! Got lots of compliments on them the first time I wore them. Only con is they aren't comfortable. However, considering they're a 4 inch stiletto they weren't as bad as I imagined. They stretch after a few minutes of wearing making them bearable.
customer_reviews.author: JRubbo

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they are a classic style. I have not worn them out yet but I love the sleek sexy look of these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Phill-E

customer_reviews.title: I won’t wear them again
customer_reviews.text: Heel was too uncomfortable to be worn all night, but with no alternative available I had to. Two and a half weeks later I still have numbness in my toes from these heels — Morton’s neuroma. I will never wear them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Painful shoes. My toes were slipping forward and I could hardly walk. Heel is not balanced
customer_reviews.author: Msuur Ityonzughul

customer_reviews.title: I love them they are super sexy
customer_reviews.text: I love them they are super sexy, super cute how ever I feel like these are not shoes you can wear if you plan on doing a lot of walking or standing. I Bought them for pictures and maybe a dinner night. If you have a wide-set foot I do not recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sokie Stone

customer_reviews.title: Maybe if you have narrow feet with super skinny ankles
customer_reviews.text: Too small for me and the ankle strap barely fit around my ankle. Maybe if you have narrow feet with super skinny ankles. Not for me and I wouldn't consider myself to have large ankles.
customer_reviews.author: lala

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sexy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sexy shoe. I wore it for four hours at a formal party where I was standing most of the time and my feet did not hurt. I have wide feet and normally this style of shoe is painful for me but, to my surprise, it was really comfortable. I got lots of compliments on the shoe. The only down side is the ankle strap seems to be a tad bit short. I wear a 7.5-8 and ordered an 8 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sonjacharde Mixon

customer_reviews.title: Very very narrow
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful but they are extremely narrow and I have narrow feet, I’m going to keep them but I probably will not wear them very often-
customer_reviews.author: meghan d harris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of Steve Madden shoes and they all fit perfectly and are very comfortable. I read the reviews for these shoes and although the majority of the were negative, I still decided to give the shoes a try. Big mistake - the strap that goes across the toes is way too tight. I couldn't even keep them on for two minutes. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Look Good, But Don’t Feel Good
customer_reviews.text: these shoes look beautiful, but are so painful! i had to wear them for a wedding and took them off immediately after the ceremony and pictures. if you can wear big heels, then definitely go ahead! maybe put foot pads on them to make it more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: cdubb

customer_reviews.title: ... wear them for more then an hour without feeling like my toes are going to absolutely fall off
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are gorgeous but I can't wear them for more then an hour without feeling like my toes are going to absolutely fall off. They are so ungodly uncomfortable, it's not worth it. Honestly I made my boyfriend rub my feel for about 35 minutes after wearing these shoes for half an evening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of these shoes and got a ton ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes and got a ton of compliments. Unfortunately, they are unbelievably painful. After wearing them the 3rd time while trying to break them in, they still put me in band aids. I'll wear these again, but only if it's a very short event.
customer_reviews.author: Chelce Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have wide feet
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would say is if your foot is wide over the toes this shoe will hurt your baby toe and have a squishy look. I have narrow feet so it was fine but when I put a insole in the shoe it did squish my toes. It's definitely not for anyone with wide feet. But over all very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived with the leather already peeling off and the ankle straps fraying. I bought them for a wedding so I decided to keep them and wear them anyway. After wearing once, there are dents in the heels. The are not very durable. Very disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katie OMalley

customer_reviews.title: I usually love Steve Madden shoes and they fit well but this ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. I usually love Steve Madden shoes and they fit well but this shoe was a little unsteady and the ankle strap was unusually small! Almost couldn't buckle the strap (and I have small feet!). Could only wear a few hours during a wedding rehearsal and had to switch shoes because of sheer pain and discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Returned these because they were so uncomfortable I couldn't stand them for 5 min walking in my bedroom! The design doesn't hold your foot down and the back piece rubs your achillies (spelling)
customer_reviews.author: KJ Country Chic

customer_reviews.title: Not good for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Too small, too narrow. I'm a 7 and sometimes 7 1/2. But it was too small. Not good for wide feet. My toes are spilling off the edge. I got my friend who is size 6 to try it on if it was just me but her feet was also spilling off the edge of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Daw

customer_reviews.title: Bought two pairs bc I wore the first so much
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little small (bur I have medium to wide feet). Goes with almost every outfit, good arch, very thin in width.
customer_reviews.author: Parul Patel

customer_reviews.title: Buy half a size up and you'll be good.
customer_reviews.text: I checked out the reviews and most people suggested ordering up half a size. I am a size 8 for most manufacturers and ordered up half a size this one purchase and I'm so pleased I did! :) They fit perfectly, with just enough toe room. A size 8 would have been too snug.
customer_reviews.author: Kimi Shima

customer_reviews.title: Snug strap across toes
customer_reviews.text: Loved this shoe but the strap across the toes is pretty snug
customer_reviews.author: jhawk24

customer_reviews.title: After reading all the reviews that seems like this is a consistent defect with the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Strap around the ankle is too small. After reading all the reviews that seems like this is a consistent defect with the shoe. If they could fix this the shoe could be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I Love them! Wore them to a wedding last weekend. You can dress them up or down. Perfect heel height for me (I'm 5'5). -They fit true to size -Glossy finish
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Clark

customer_reviews.title: Sexy yet understated.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and neutral shade of these shoes. They're just a tiny bit too large, but had I gone down a half size they would've been much too small. Definitely glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Ethel A

customer_reviews.title: Steven Madden should be ashamed of these
customer_reviews.text: Pinky​ toes were squished and the ankle straps were tight with terrible quality buckle straps. Immediately returned them. There are way better quality heels out there, don't waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: KO210

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable shoes I have ever worn. I wore them for less than an hour at a wedding and had to go barefoot. So embarrassing. What a waste and I won’t ever wear them again.
customer_reviews.author: Liz J.

customer_reviews.title: I have most of the colors of these Steve Madden ...
customer_reviews.text: I have most of the colors of these Steve Madden shoes but the black ones I ordered the ankle strap is shorter than normal. Will have to send back.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this type of shoe! And on amazon it was fast shipping and it came as expected. It is a bit tight in the front but I think with normal wear, the front band will adjust. I have the other version, the Marlee, I think and it fits pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: CyincerelyYours

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is terrible. DO NOT BUY unless you will be sitting ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is terrible. DO NOT BUY unless you will be sitting the entire time. They are very cute, but very cheap and I could not stand up for longer than 15 minutes. I wore them to a wedding that I was in. They rubbed the bottom of my feet to the point that they felt like they were burning.
customer_reviews.author: Eboni

customer_reviews.title: Broke first time worn
customer_reviews.text: The back part that holds the strap broke the first time I wore them, within like 20 minutes. I was at a wedding and they broke at the beginning of cocktail hour. I had to try not to walk funny all night.
customer_reviews.author: Abaigeal M.

customer_reviews.title: Sole Padding Came Unstuck
customer_reviews.text: They fit just fine, but the lining under the pad of my foot came unstuck after a few wears. Would expect longer-lasting quality from Steve Madden
customer_reviews.author: bpiper

customer_reviews.title: Very cute I maybe should have gotten a 9. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute I maybe should have gotten a 9. I am usually an 8 or 8.5 but my feet are on the wider side.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but painful
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty, but the ankle strap is terribly painful and badly positioned. I had to pre-bandaid my ankles to get through a night in these. Never wearing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable enough for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoes especially in this plum colour! Comfortable enough for what it is. Not made for walking long distance of course haha. Nice minimalist but sexy! Love them and have them in a couple colours.
customer_reviews.author: Tres-B

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect! I'm glad I listened and order a half ...
customer_reviews.text: Normally wear a size 7. After reading reviews bought a size 6.5. It was perfect! I'm glad I listened and order a half a size down. Perfect shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to wear anywhere knowing they won't hurt you until ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute and petite they match with everything! Wore it at an event where I danced a lot and it only started hurting me about five hours later. Perfect to wear anywhere knowing they won't hurt you until a long while after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute But TOO Narrow
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is the perfect blush color but it is made for very skinny feet. The strap on top was way too tight for my foot and my pinky toe was hanging off side due to the narrowness of the shoe. Too bad because the shoe is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Overall the shoes are pretty however the size was a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Overall the shoes are pretty however the size was a bit small, my size is always 7.5 but this one felt a bit tighter, the ankle strap is too tight, I think a size larger would have felt better, but overall quality is realy good, the packaging was good and it was delivered even earlier than anticipated which ofcourse was great !
customer_reviews.author: Zekra

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a half size up and these are perfect! More comfortable than I was expecting. Will probably order in another color too.
customer_reviews.author: heartmel

customer_reviews.title: Try for yourself!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received today and I was so nervous because the reviews were up and down....I normally wear a 6.5 - 7 in heels....I ordered a 6.5 in this heel and I LOVE THEM!!!!! Sexy, as comfortable as you can get for high heels...can’t wait to wear them out!
customer_reviews.author: Kerianne

customer_reviews.title: I have lots of Steve Madden shoes and this was ...
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of Steve Madden shoes and this was the one color missing. I am a fan of the Stecy and Carrson styles. I call them my 5 hour shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed! I run an 8
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed! I run an 8.5 to 9 so I thought i'ld be safe with ordering a 9. I couldn't fit my toes through the top strap. I have other Steve maddens and have never had a problem before. Beautiful shoe but bad design and unwearable. Maybe it would work with a very narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort level is about where I'd expect it to be for this heel height - not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Comfort level is about where I'd expect it to be for this heel height - not bad at all. Love the look.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Right straps
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a 6; got 6.5. It fit well, beautiful shoe with clean design. Only problem is the straps are a bit tight
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these nude shoes! Very classy and can mix with a lot of different outfits
customer_reviews.author: J.N.

customer_reviews.title: The colors are more vibrant in person and all around the shoes look better in person
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to wear with a coral colored evening gown on a cruise. They matched perfectly! The colors are more vibrant in person and all around the shoes look better in person. They will match a lot more than the coral dress, so I'm looking forward to wearing them more. All together pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for a wedding and ordered a size 5.5, and they fit perfectly. I have a small/narrow foot (size 5-5.5) and they fit as expected. They were beautiful and I received many compliments. Looks as pictured. I do not wear 4+ inch heels often and they were uncomfortable after a couple hours of dancing but they were worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael K.

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Women's Stecy Dress Sandal
product_meta.description:
Classic open toe high heel dress sandal with single strap featuring buckle closure at ankle and covered heel

What began as a modest $1100 investment in 1990 has developed into one of the most iconic brands in footwear. From a factory in Queens, NY, Steve Madden has revolutionized the shoe industry, merging years of experience with unique and creative designs. Inspired by rock and roll and his New York roots, his vision to provide on-trend women and men with an outlet to express their individuality is innovative, daring, and inspiring. Steve’s innate understanding of trends and unparalleled willpower have resulted in millions of customers worldwide and propelled his designs to the forefront of fashion. He has expanded the Steve Madden brand into a true lifestyle and destination for footwear, handbags and accessories, sold in over 80 countries worldwide. It’s about authenticity. It’s about embracing individuality. It’s Steve Madden.
feature_bullets: Faux metallic foil leather with ankle strap.
